content.text: Learn how to style social media buttons with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to style social media buttons with CSS.

content.text: How To Style Social Media Buttons

content.code: ...
content.code_html:
<!-- Add icon library -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">

<!-- Add font awesome icons -->
<a href="#" class="fa fa-facebook"></a>
<a href="#" class="fa fa-twitter"></a>
...

syntaxHighlighting.text: padding: 20px;  font-size: 30px;  width: 50px;  text-align: center;  text-decoration: none;
/* Add a hover effect if you want */
/* Set a specific color for each brand */

syntax_highlighting.text: padding: 20px;  font-size: 30px;  width: 50px;  text-align: center;  text-decoration: none;
/* Add a hover effect if you want */
/* Set a specific color for each brand */

content.code_html:
/* Style all font awesome icons */
.fa {
  padding: 20px;
  font-size: 30px;
  width: 50px;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
}

/* Add a hover effect if you want */
.fa:hover {
  opacity: 0.7;
}

/* Set a specific color for each brand */

/* Facebook */
.fa-facebook {
  background: #3B5998;
  color: white;
}

/* Twitter */
.fa-twitter {
  background: #55ACEE;
  color: white;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text: padding: 20px;  font-size: 30px;  width: 50px;  text-align: center;  text-decoration: none;
/* Add a hover effect if you want */

content.text: Tip: Add border-radius:50% to create round buttons, and reduce the width :
content.html: Tip: Add border-radius:50% to create round buttons, and reduce the width:

content.code_html:
.fa {
  padding: 20px;
  font-size: 30px;
  width: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 50%;
}
